member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Types.K_Type
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<Type> derived type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Types.K_Type`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<Type, K_Type<TSelf>> derived type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Types.K_TypeArray
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<Type[]> type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Types.K_TypeArray`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<Type[], K_TypeArray<TSelf>> derived type.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Types.Type`1
member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the System.Type value from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the value to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be useful when creating domain-specific const argument providers, such as default values, when a const argument provider's value needs to be wrapped for use in a different context.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Types.TypeArray`1
member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the System.Type array from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the array to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be useful when creating domain-specific const argument providers, such as default values, when a const argument provider's value needs to be wrapped for use in a different context.
